mapper.select: SELECT D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR FROM tbl_dept
SELECT D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR FROM tbl_dept WHERE D_CODE = #{d_code}
SELECT D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR FROM tbl_dept WHERE D_NAME LIKE '%' || #{d_name} || '%'
SELECT D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR FROM tbl_dept WHERE D_CEO LIKE '%' || #{d_ceo} || '%'
SELECT D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR FROM tbl_dept WHERE D_NAME LIKE '%' || #{d_name} || '%' AND D_CEO LIKE '%' || #{d_ceo} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dept ( D_CODE, D_NAME, D_CEO, D_TEL, D_ADDR ) VALUES ( #{d_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{d_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{d_ceo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{d_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{d_addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
